CLARISA

CGIAR Level Agricultural Results
Interoperable System Architecture
This is a service envisioned to provide standards in form of control lists that should be used across management information systems in CGIAR to enable interoperability. It is currently under construction and expected to be finalized and functionalities available for use in Q4 of 2019.

Annual Report 2019 (Control Lists)
